amendment.description: An amendment to strike all after the enacting clause and insert the following new text entitled the "Department of State Authorities Act, Fiscal Year 2017, Improvements Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Royce (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Royce (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Royce (CA).
